channel.title: NEED CLIENT CODER - Scape Of Legends
channel.description: I am looking for a client coder. I have the server all set but the last thing that is left is the client. You need to be able to make a webclient and help with future client updates. If you are interested leave a reply, or add me on my Skype. Feel free to message me on Skype with any questions. Skype: scapeoflegends
